definition: to show one's face/to make one's good name/to become successful and well known/to shine
dew/syrup/nectar/outdoors (not under cover)/to show/to reveal/to betray/to expose

sentences.english: One morning, very early, before the sun was up.

我這次給我們兩個露露臉。

sentences.english: The sun won't be seen again for many years.
sentences.chinese: 莊稼毀了，太陽有多年都沒有露臉了。

sentences.english: Therefore, a in a media appearances in evidence chance, he never pass.
sentences.chinese: 因此，大凡有在媒體露臉留痕的機會，他都絕不放過。

definition: photogenic/to appear on film or in the media
